From the pages of CIVIL WAR: THE INITIATIVE comes Canada's newest super hero team! But this is not your father's FLIGHT. Bold and daring, OMEGA FLIGHT is the best 5-issue series you'll EVER read.,2007,5
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
